message(STATUS "Fetching printf...")

set(BUILD_STATIC_LIBRARY ON)
set(SUPPORT_DECIMAL_SPECIFIERS ON)
set(SUPPORT_EXPONENTIAL_SPECIFIERS ON)
set(SUPPORT_LONG_LONG OFF)
set(ALIAS_STANDARD_FUNCTION_NAMES ON)

set_directory_properties(PROPERTIES EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL YES)

FetchContent_MakeAvailable(printf)
